entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
